enemania.title: Enemania - Defend Your Treasure in This Fun Tower Defense Game
enemania.slogan: Strategic Tower Defense with Quirky Enemies
enemania.description: Enemania is a fun and strategic tower defense game where you defend your treasure from waves of quirky enemies like skeletons, orcs, and mummies. Place and upgrade cannons, catapults, and bombs to keep the invaders at bay. With each level introducing new challenges, smart planning and quick decisions will help you stay ahead and win!

HomeIframe.title: Enemania
HomeIframe.description: Defend your treasure in Enemania, a strategic tower defense game with quirky enemies and challenging levels.

HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep1: Place and upgrade cannons, catapults, and bombs to keep the invaders at bay.
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep2: With each level introducing new challenges, smart planning and quick decisions will help you stay ahead.
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep3: Win by defending your treasure from all waves of enemies.
HomeFeatures.feature1Description: Plan and execute strategies to defend your treasure effectively.
HomeFeatures.feature2Description: Face waves of unique enemies like skeletons, orcs, and mummies.
HomeFeatures.feature3Description: Upgrade cannons, catapults, and bombs to enhance your defenses.
